summary: A longbow fit for a manly Nord Warrior...
descriptionHtml:
Update: Added a slightly quicker draw variant, for people who just want the long bow visuals as a replacement to the default high level bows. File: Heartwood Longbow Archer.

My image of a Nordic Warrior involves giant two-handed claymores and longbows, and so I found it sad that in Skyrim, where the theme is clearly very Norse, the long bow is one of the lowest tiers of weapons, and frankly feels pretty flimsy.

 I felt it only right that the heavy close combat characters should have with their bows what they have in their Claymores and Warhammers; huge damage, at the cost of speed. This Bow IS slow, and not intended for archer characters, I just felt it more in line with the sort of character I was playing.

THE BOW:
The Bow has a base damage of 35 (balanced out with speed so that the Damage per Second is 1). For lack of a better name, I called it Heartwood Long Bow (googled longbows and picked a word..).

LOCATION:
The Bow is sold in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun, with base cost 350 gold (will go up based on your speechcraft).

On a side note, I would like to do the following things with the bow, but currently lack the knowledge/skill to do so. Anyone who has any advice on doing these things please message me:
- Make the bow BIGGER. Apparently resizing in NIFskope isn\'t enough?
- Make it unusable in Sneak Mode.
Thanks
author: jacksmith15
